verses.name: Genesis 25:1
verses.text: Then again Abraham took a wife, and her name was Keturah.

verses.name: Genesis 25:2
verses.text: And she bare him Zimran, and Jokshan, and Medan, and Midian, and Ishbak, and Shuah.

verses.name: Genesis 25:3
verses.text: And Jokshan begat Sheba, and Dedan. And the sons of Dedan were Asshurim, and Letushim, and Leummim.

verses.name: Genesis 25:4
verses.text: And the sons of Midian; Ephah, and Epher, and Hanoch, and Abida, and Eldaah. All these were the children of Keturah.

verses.name: Genesis 25:5
verses.text: And Abraham gave all that he had unto Isaac.
